statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits
SELECT audit_type, audit_date FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT audit_type, COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM regulatory_audits GROUP BY audit_type
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, inspector_name FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_type = 'Quality Control';
SELECT audit_type, COUNT(audit_id) AS total_audits FROM regulatory_audits GROUP BY audit_type HAVING total_audits > 2;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE inspector_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT DISTINCT audit_type FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_details;
SELECT id, date, auditor_name FROM audit_details WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT SUM(score) AS total_score FROM inspection_details;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM inspection_details WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT date, auditor_name, status FROM audit_details ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM audit_details WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspection_details WHERE inspection_type = 'Daily' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT audit_id, audit_status FROM audit_details WHERE audit_status IN ('Completed', 'Pending') AND audit_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(audit_date) AS latest_audit_date, COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM audit_details;
SELECT AVG(inspection_score) AS average_score, MIN(inspection_score) AS lowest_score, MAX(inspection_score) AS highest_score FROM inspection_details WHERE inspection_type = 'Monthly';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, audit_score FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspection_details WHERE inspection_type='Routine';
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspection_details WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT monitoring_id, monitor_name, issue_found FROM compliance_monitoring ORDER BY monitoring_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_score > 80 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT audit_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM regulatory_audits GROUP BY audit_type;
SELECT * FROM inspection_details WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01' AND inspection_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT monitor_name, count(*) AS count FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY monitor_name ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, AVG(LENGTH(inspection_result)) AS avg_result_length FROM inspection_details GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING AVG(LENGTH(inspection_result)) > 100;
SELECT * FROM Audit;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_date FROM Audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_type FROM Inspection WHERE inspection_result='Passed';
SELECT audit_id, audit_type FROM Audit WHERE audit_result='Failed' ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audit_result FROM Audit WHERE audit_type='Internal' AND audit_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Audit;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_type FROM Audit WHERE audit_result = 'Pass';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM Inspection ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AuditDetails WHERE audit_question LIKE '%safety%';
SELECT audit_id, COUNT(*) AS total_details FROM AuditDetails GROUP BY audit_id HAVING total_details > 3;
SELECT * FROM audit_details;
SELECT audit_name, audit_date FROM audit_details WHERE audit_id = '123456';
SELECT MIN(audit_date), MAX(audit_date) FROM audit_details;
SELECT auditor_name, COUNT(*) FROM audit_details GROUP BY auditor_name;
SELECT * FROM inspection_details ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_details ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT audit_name, auditor_name FROM audit_details WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT audit_name, finding_text FROM audit_details JOIN audit_findings ON audit_details.audit_id = audit_findings.audit_id;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspection_details ORDER BY inspection_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT audit_name, inspection_type, compliance_score FROM audit_details JOIN compliance_stats ON audit_details.audit_id = compliance_stats.audit_id ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
